DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety fixed-dose , single-capsule budesonide ( 400µg ) -formoterol ( 12µg ) combination , comparison budesonide alone , deliver via dry powder inhaler , 181 patient uncontrolled asthma.This Randomized , double-blind , multicenter , phase III , parallel clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety Fixed-dose , Single-capsule Budesonide-formoterol Combination Uncontrolled Asthma
